name: Endless Circle
description:
To play Endless Cirlce you will have to click on the screen to make the ball change course, there are two possible paths, you will have to switch between them quickly to prevent the ball from hitting the spikes.

It seems easy but it is not since there are certain inducements that make it more difficult:

-The spikes can be seen coming only when you are quite close to them, so you will have to be attentive and be quick of reflexes.

-In certain moments of the game you will see that the direction of the ball is changed, and you will be warned because you will see how the colors change completely, but this is also a matter of seconds, so you will have to be very attentive.

Some features:

-Classic and efective style

-Easy to understand gameplay

-Moderate difficulty
